TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripDropDownButton extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem

summary.span: 表示单击时显示关联的 的控件，用户可从该下拉控件中选择一项。

span.span: Represents a control that when clicked displays an associated from which the user can select a single item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 看起来像，但它显示了下拉区域，当用户单击它。 looks like , but it shows a drop-down area when the user clicks it. 隐藏或显示的下拉箭头，通过设置属性。Hide or show the drop-down arrow by setting the property. 主机显示溢出项。 hosts a that displays items that overflow the . 使用激活熟悉的下拉列表控件，如颜色选取器。Use the to activate familiar drop-down controls such as color pickers. 设置属性设置为`true`以更清楚地向用户指示的其他选项都可在下拉列表上。Set the property to `true` to more clearly indicate to the user that further options are available on the drop-down list. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示三个控制何时单击。The following code example displays three controls when the is clicked. 按钮更改窗体的前景色。The buttons change the foreground color of the form. span.span: A new accessibility object for this instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的实例支持 UI 自动化展开/折叠模式。The instance returned by this method supports the UI Automation expand/collapse pattern. 但是，选项仅适用于.NET Framework 4.7.1 或更高版本运行的应用程序，并且可以重新编译以面向.NET Framework 4.7.1 或通过使用 AppCompat 交换机参与到此.NET Framework 可访问性增强功能。However, it's only available in applications that are running on the .NET Framework 4.7.1 or later versions and are either recompiled to target the .NET Framework 4.7.1 or opt in to this .NET Framework accessibility enhancements by using an AppCompat switch. 有关详细信息，请参阅[迁移指南](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/retargeting/4.7-4.7.1.md#windows-forms)。For more information, see the [migration guide](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/retargeting/4.7-4.7.1.md#windows-forms).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void OnMouseDown(class System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub OnMouseDown (e As MouseEventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.
Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.
